name: Hangout
intro: Social game based on the open world
introduce: Hangout is a 2D pixel Massive Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG). Players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences while enjoying various social, business, and entertainment activities on 9 different blockchains in a single Web3 Metaverse. In Hangout, users can hold a party with friends, arrange an online meeting with colleagues, display NFTs to other players, play games, or simply hang out with like-minded Adventurers.
